title: Eye Puns
author: JGray
text:
In the original script this was written as, "Eye see..." but really, Jack Kirby did that schtick back in his OMAC days. And while I'll borrow the King's dots I won't steal his act!

Ahem!

You know, if this ever gets made into a movie I'd want Henson's Creature Shop to make the signpost.

Speaking of movies, it is fake movie casting time!

Who would YOU cast in the Mysteries of the Arcana movie? Who plays Chrys? Who plays Theresa? Who plays Melody? Who does the voice acting and mo-cap for William?

Leave a comment and tell me!

See you Monday!

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text:
Are you kidding me? The system just ate my first post. *sigh*

Let's see if I can at least sum it up.

Never thought about it. Kinda hard to do it.

I've got ideas for some of the cast.

Matt Smith for Kludge.

Maggy Cheung for Circe.

Jessica Biel for Chrys.

Natascha McElhone for Melody.

Andy Serkis to do the mo-cap work for William.
